seo.title_override: Atlanta Mattress Disposal Guide 2026: Easy & Eco-Friendly
seo.meta_desc_override: Atlanta residents, easily dispose of your old mattress! Discover rules for curbside pickup and other options. No fines for proper disposal. Get your guide for 2026 now!

hero_hook: Don't let Atlanta's rainy weather turn your old mattress into a soggy, heavy burden; find out how to dispose of it easily.
neighborhoods: Midtown, Buckhead, Old Fourth Ward, Inman Park, Virginia-Highland, Candler Park, Grant Park, West End, Adair Park, Cabbagetown, Reynoldstown, East Atlanta Village, Little Five Points, Poncey-Highland, Kirkwood

curbside_rules.placement_time: Place in green cart(s) curbside no later than 7 a.m. on collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: 96-gallon roll cart for solid waste collection.
curbside_rules.the_catch: Remove cart(s) by 9 a.m. the day after collection day.
curbside_rules.schedule_logic: Collected once a week; specific day can be found using the SWS Operations Tool.

weather_profile.rejection_risk_copy: WARNING: Atlanta averages 100+ rainy days per year. If your mattress gets wet before pickup, the city WILL NOT take it (too heavy, mold risk). Our haulers pick up from inside your home — rain or shine.
